sentences.english: I'm using exactly the same form to reduce this.
sentences.chinese: 我用的同样的方法来减少问题的规模。

sentences.english: The Nokia 1209 also has a one-piece key mat for durability and reliability.
sentences.chinese: 诺基亚1209也同样是一款耐用和可靠的好机型。

sentences.english: I am tired of hunting the same old coon.
sentences.chinese: 反复干同样的事，我真干腻了。

sentences.english: Note that the standard requires an empty line after the headers too.
sentences.chinese: 注意该标准同样要求在域头之后要有个空行。

sentences.english: We think it’s possible that your company is at risk in this area as well.
sentences.chinese: 因而我们认为贵司在这个领域也可能面临同样的风险。

sentences.english: "And also this affair must be discreet, " Kugelmass continued.
sentences.chinese: “然后同样这次外遇必须保密，”库马思继续。

sentences.english: The Taliban also banned, wouldn’t you know it, the keeping of songbirds.
sentences.chinese: 你不难猜出，塔利班同样禁止了留养金丝雀。

sentences.english: Again, I'm not opposed to long-term deficit reduction, so long as it's equitable.
sentences.chinese: 同样，我不反对长期削减赤字，只要它的公平。

sentences.english: We educate with silence as well.
sentences.chinese: 安静同样可以进行教育。

sentences.english: "Piano lessons, " I tell Kevin. "Same as last year. "
sentences.chinese: “学钢琴”，我报告凯文，“和客岁同样”。

sentences.english: Many of our picks also share Tinley Park's family-friendly atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 很多我们的推荐也同样有家庭友好的气氛。

sentences.english: Again, this is good news but let us put it in perspective.
sentences.chinese: 同样，这也是个好消息，但让我们正确看待它。

sentences.english: A broader set of primitives, but nonetheless the same fundamental thing holds.
sentences.chinese: 一些广阔的基本类型，但还是同样的基本东西。

sentences.english: Users of popular Twitter-like microblogging service Sina Weibo were likewise disbelieving.
sentences.chinese: 新浪微博的用户也同样不相信这个裁定结果。

sentences.english: And Pierre began to have the same feeling towards Karataev.
sentences.chinese: 皮埃尔也开始对卡拉塔耶夫抱着同样的感情。

sentences.english: In the same way, the Lord took the time and effort to stitch you together.
sentences.chinese: 同样的，上帝也是一针一线把你缝纫起来。

definition: of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
(conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
